segments.text: The bathroom looks lovely . Did you redecorate it yourself or did you get someone in to do it for you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I did it myself . I went online and found a lot of website devoted to home improvement . Then I went to DIY shop and bought everything I needed . I ’ m sure I saved a lot of money by doing it myself and it was fun too . I learnt a lot by doing it myself .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: So , let ’ s see . You have put new tiles on the floor and replaced a few tiles on the walls . You ’ Ve also added a small cupboard for toiletries . The bath , shower , and washbasin are the same as before , aren ’ t they ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , they are . I gave them a good clean . They are in good condition and don ’ t need to be replaced .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How long did it take you to do the tiling .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: As I hadn ’ t done it before , I had to keep referring to income 3ation I got from the internet . Doing the floor tiles took a whole day-from early morning to right through to the evening . Then I spent a few hours replacing the cracked wall tiles . Putting the cupboard up took about an hour , so it took me two days altogether .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I think you ’ Ve done a very good job . As least as good as a professional would do . Perhaps I can convince you to redo my bathroom ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You ’ ll be lucky ! However , I ’ ll print out the income 3ation I got from the internet and you can do it yourself .
segments.speaker: S2
